text: @brithume Who’s going to pay for the millions that lost jobs, put on house arrest, lost lives or know of someone that did and inconvenienced from Covid-19 fallout?  It’s not his fault of course, but PrezT is in deep trouble as voters always want payback.  Pulling this fat from the fire is?
